full_text:
CERTIFICATION
This certifies that I have been instructed by representatives of Philip Morris U.S.A.,
or their designated distributing agency, on branded merchandise distribution
guidelines and restrictions.
I will offer branded merchandise only to smokers who are 21 years of age or older,
and I will follow all other distribution guidelines and restrictions.
I recognize that I am subject to immediate dismissal if I offer branded merchandise to
any smoker who is not 21 years of age or older, or if I violate any distribution
restrictions.
Saia Fornecau
Signature
1/8/97
Date
2065216389
(rycs):\pmusalvaslims\bigretrn.ag3
B-3
